Ninja Resurrection, known in Japan as Makai TenshÃ…ï¿½: Jigoku-hen (trans. Demonic Resurrection: Portrait of Hell) is a two-part original video animation directed by Yasunori Urata.
 The OVA series is based on Futaro Yamada's novel Makai TenshÃ…ï¿½. Although based on the same source material and of a similar style, Ninja Resurrection is not a sequel to the anime film Ninja Scroll.
